alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued May 11 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS Child Abduction Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of North Carolina Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION....THE STANLY COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR A MISSING CHILD STEPHANIE MICHELE MORTON. STEPHANIE MICHELE MORTON IS A 16-YEAR-OLD WHITE FEMALE APPROXIMATELY 5 FEET 4 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 175 POUNDS. SHE HAS RED HAIR AND BLUE EYES. THE VICTIM IS BELIEVED TO BE WITH DUANE HOWARD BARTLETT. DUANE HOWARD BARTLETT IS DESCRIBED AS 30 YEARS OLD WHITE MALE. DRIVING A RED IN COLOR PASSENGER CAR. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS CASE CALL THE STANLY COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IMMEDIATELY AT 704 985-0656 OR CALL 911 OR HP. ACTIVATE CMAS IN REGION 8
